entry.et: Middle French or Latin; Middle French insulter, from Latin insultare, literally, to spring upon, from in- + saltare to leap saltation

def.dt: :to treat with insolence, indignity, or contempt :affront
:to affect offensively or damagingly doggerel that insults the reader's intelligence
:injury to the body or one of its parts
:something that causes or has a potential for causing such insult pollution and other environmental insults
